name: NoAimGame
description:
(This game was made for the Dream Arcade Archive)

Hey! This is my first game jam game. I made this in the span of two days (yes, yes, I know, in a nine-day game jam...) and I'm really proud of the work I've done on it.

Clicking moves your character onto your cursor, and pressing the space bar releases a shockwave, damaging any enemy in a short radius.

I've got more stuff planned for the future! I might open donations but not sure if I'll do that.

HUGE thanks to Jammerjab for helping with all the major art assets in the game!

Currently, the game has a grand total of six enemies, including one boss, which is fought every so often...
